scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify src/main.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > dist/build.js
scripts.force-update: npm install --save mint-sass pilot-reset vue vuex
scripts.force-update-dev: npm install --save-dev browserify browserify-hmr cross-env envify http-server node-sass npm-run-all uglify-js vueify watchify
